text: @NYGovCuomo Yet we're reopening college dorms & student housing? Does anyone believe hormone infused 18 yr olds away from home for 1st time will wear masks or social distance? The health of entire #NewYork communities will be at risk #COVIDー19 #coronavirus @melissadderosa #newyorktough
